column2: You are a wizard most high, descending into the darkest dungeons.
You must collect the Mistress' Staff, an artifact of untold power.
Are you ready to venture forth and claim victory?
You have reached the end of the playable portion.
Come back later for new dungeons!
You climb down the stairs to the next level
You search through the debris but find nothing of note
You find some gold coins in a corner (+XXX gold)
The zombie slips a restraint on you! (+RestraintAdded)
The angry rat nibbles at your toes! (-DamageTaken WP)
